description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Tommy Myles and John Malachi, Turkish Embassy, Washington, D.C., between 1938 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 428 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P.
